text: Conspiracy of the Doomed () is a 1950 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Kalatozov.«Заговор обреченных»Заговор обреченных (1950) == Actors == * Lyudmila Skopina as Ganna Likhta (as L. Skopina) * Pavel Kadochnikov as Maks Venta (as P. Kadochnikov) * Vladimir Druzhnikov as Mark Pino (as V. Druzhnikov) * Boris Sitko as Kosta Varra (as B. Sitko) * Vsevolod Aksyonov as Sloveno (as V. Aksyonov) * Luiza Koshukova as Magda Forsgolm (as L. Koshukova) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1950 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalatozov
title: Conspiracy of the Doomed
